flawed_nl_solution:
There were 30 + 20 = <<30+20=80>>80 attendees at the party.
A total of 80 x 2/5 = <<80*2/5=32>>32 people left the party.
Nine of those who left were men while 32 - 9 = <<32-9=23>>23 of them were women.
So, 30 - 23= <<30-23=7>>7 women stayed at the party.
And 20 - 9 = <<20-9=11>>11 men stayed at the party.
Thus, 7 - 11 = <<7-11=-4>>-4 more women than men stayed at the party.
#### -4

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 50, not 80. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
